ingredients: 1 pound beef, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 teaspoon ginger paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, salt, oil
cooking_method: 1. Cut beef into small pieces and marinate with salt and turmeric powder. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, and turmeric powder. 4. Add beef and fry for 5 minutes. 5. Add water and let it cook until the beef is tender.

ingredients: 1 pound fish, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 green chilies, 1 teaspoon garlic paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, salt, oil
cooking_method: 1. Cut fish into pieces and marinate with salt and turmeric powder. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic paste, cumin powder, and green chilies. 4. Add tomatoes and fry until they turn into a paste. 5. Add water and let it cook for 5 minutes. 6. Add fish and cook until the fish is tender.

ingredients: 1 pound chicken, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 teaspoon ginger paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, salt, oil, 1 cup yogurt
cooking_method: 1. Cut chicken into small pieces and marinate with salt and turmeric powder. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, and turmeric powder. 4. Add chicken and fry for 5 minutes. 5. Add water and let it cook until the chicken is tender. 6. Add yogurt and let it cook for 5 more minutes.

ingredients: 1 cup lentils, 1 onion, 1 garlic clove, 1 teaspoon ginger paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, salt, oil, water
cooking_method: 1. Wash lentils and soak for 30 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, and coriander powder. 4. Add lentils and fry for 2 minutes. 5. Add water and let it cook for 30 minutes or until lentils are tender. 6. Add salt and cook for 5 more minutes.

ingredients: 1 onion, 1 garlic clove, 1 teaspoon ginger paste, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, salt, oil, vegetables (potatoes, carrots, cauliflower, peas, etc.)
cooking_method: 1. Cut vegetables into small pieces. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, and coriander powder. 4. Add vegetables

ingredients: 2 cups Basmati rice, 2 lbs chicken or beef, 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tsp garlic paste, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp garam masala powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, salt, oil, water
cooking_method: 1. Soak rice in water for 30 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pot and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add ginger paste, garlic paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, red chili powder, and salt. 4. Add meat and fry for 5-10 minutes. 5. Add water and let it cook until the meat is tender. 6. Remove meat from the pot and set aside. 7. In the same pot, add rice and fry for 2-3 minutes. 8. Add water and bring to a boil. 9. Reduce heat to low and let the rice cook for 10-15 minutes or until done. 10. In a separate pot, mix meat, yogurt, and some of the cooked rice. 11. Add layers of rice and meat mixture until all the rice and meat is used. 12. Cover the pot and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.

ingredients: 1 lb shrimp, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 cup coconut milk, salt, oil
cooking_method: 1. Peel and devein the shrimp. 2. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. 4. Add shrimp and fry for 2-3 minutes. 5. Add coconut milk and let it cook for 5-7 minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice.

ingredients: For the dough: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tsp salt, 1/4 cup oil, water, For the filling: 1 lb potatoes, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, salt, oil
cooking_method: 1. For the dough, mix flour, salt, and oil in a bowl. 2. Add water little by little and knead the dough until it's smooth. 3. Cover the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. 4. For the filling, boil potatoes until tender and mash them. 5. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions until golden brown. 6. Add garlic, ginger paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. 7. Add mashed potatoes and fry for 2

ingredients: 1 cup basmati rice,1/2 cup split yellow lentils (masoor dal), 1/2 cup sliced onions,1 tablespoon minced garlic,1 tablespoon minced ginger,2 tablespoons of oil,4 cups of water,1 teaspoon of turmeric powder
cooking_method: To make Bhuna Khichuri, start by rinsing 1 cup of basmati rice and 1/2 cup of split yellow lentils (masoor dal) separately and soaking them in water for at least 30 minutes. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat and add 1/2 cup of sliced onions, 1 tablespoon of minced garlic, and 1 tablespoon of minced ginger. Cook until the onions are golden brown, then add the soaked rice and lentils and stir well. Add 4 cups of water, 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder, and salt to taste, then bring the mixture to a boil. Once it's boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 25 minutes, or until the rice and lentils are cooked through and the mixture has thickened. Finally, give the Khichuri a good stir, garnish it with some fried onions and serve hot with your favorite sides.

ingredients: 1 cup basmati rice,1/2 cup split yellow lentils (masoor dal), 1/2 cup sliced onions,1 tablespoon minced garlic,1 tablespoon minced ginger,2 tablespoons of oil,4 cups of water,1 teaspoon of turmeric powder
cooking_method: To make Bhuna Khichuri, start by rinsing 1 cup of basmati rice and 1/2 cup of split yellow lentils (masoor dal) separately and soaking them in water for at least 30 minutes. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat and add 1/2 cup of sliced onions, 1 tablespoon of minced garlic, and 1 tablespoon of minced ginger. Cook until the onions are golden brown, then add the soaked rice and lentils and stir well. Add 4 cups of water, 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder, and salt to taste, then bring the mixture to a boil. Once it's boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 25 minutes, or until the rice and lentils are cooked through and the mixture has thickened. Finally, give the Khichuri a good stir, garnish it with some fried onions and serve hot with your favorite sides.

ingredients: 1 cup of red lentils,2 tbsp of ghee, 1/2 cup sliced onions,1 onion, sliced,1 tsp of cumin seeds,2 tablespoons of oil,2 garlic cloves, minced,1/2 tsp of turmeric powder,Salt to taste,2 cups of water
cooking_method: Wash the lentils and soak them in water for 30 minutes. In a pan, heat ghee and fry the sliced onions until they turn golden brown.Add the cumin seeds and minced garlic to the pan and fry for a few more seconds. Add the turmeric powder, salt, and soaked lentils to the pan and fry for a few more minutes. Add water to the pan and bring it to a boil. Cover the pan and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes. Once the lentils are cooked, mash them with a spoon or a hand blender. Serve hot with rice.

ingredients: 1 cup of chickpeas, boiled and mashed,1 onion, chopped, 1 tomato, chopped,1 cucumber, chopped,2 green chillies, chopped,1 tbsp of tamarind paste,1 tbsp of coriander leaves, chopped,Salt to taste,Fuchka shells
cooking_method: Mix the boiled and mashed chickpeas with chopped onions, tomatoes, cucumbers, green chillies, tamarind paste, coriander leaves, and salt.Take a fuchka shell and make a hole in it with your thumb.Fill the shell with the chickpea mixture.Dip the filled fuchka shell into a bowl of spicy tamarind water and serve immediately.
